1.0.name: wordpress/be-subpages-widget
1.0.description:
This widget will dynamically list a section's subpages. When on a page, it will find the section's top level page and list its children.

It can also include the current page's subpages in listing.

You can customize the listing with the following filters: be_subpages_widget_args - modifies the arguments passed to wp_list_pages be_subpages_page_title - customize the page title

Contributors: - billerickson - scil

Support Forum
